parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Enable/Disable OFF-delay
parameter.description: Activate/Deactivate Automatic turning off relay after set time

options.option: Auto OFF disabled for both relays

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Relay 1: OFF-delay time (10ms steps)
parameter.description: Automatic turning off relay 1 after set time, in 10ms increments (default: 200ms)

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Relay 2: OFF-delay time (10ms steps)
parameter.description: Automatic turning off relay 2 after set time, in 10ms increments (default: 200ms)

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Separation of association sending (key 1)
parameter.description: Activate/Deactivate association sending for group 1 - Also see param #16

options.option: Map status to all devices in group 1
Map OFF status to all devices in group 1, Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to prev.value
Map OFF status to all devices in group 1, Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to 100%

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Control key #2 behaviour
parameter.description: Key no.2 is not represented by any physical device - only devices in the association list. This functionality prevents of lack of reaction on pressing key no.2 through polling devices from association list one by one and checking their actual statuses.

options.option: Device status is not checked
Device status is checked

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Inputs behaviour
parameter.description: In case of bi-stable switches, define their behaviour (toggle or follow)

options.option: Toggle

Mono-stable input (button)
Bi-stable input (switch)
